title: Why can't Aatrox swap W's while reviving?
body:
It just doesn't make sense why he shouldn't be able to. Seriously, why not? Seems so obvious. It feels really bad to die because I couldn't swap to Blood Thist quick enough and heal. It would be 10x more convenient if I could do it while reviving.

Riot pls

replies.body: lol, make it so the more times you spam w, you heal more. like a heart beat rushing blood in the adrenaline rush of it all. that'd be a cool buff for him if people wouldn't cheat and use like, button spammers.
Yeah, no one will abuse THAT at all.
I won't, I promise! I read that best selling novel Jesus wrote and everything.

come on guys, it could be like... the castle crashers revive. if you know what im talking about, this could be a really cool buff for him. like a little bar with a moving cursor on it, and when its in the best spot you hit w on it to get a small heal boost with the revive.  would involve timing in the heat of the moment.

No its not. if you toggle it during an AA it will just briefly interrupt it for like 0.2 seconds and then he will finish the AA from where he left off. Go in the practice tool and see for yourself. I know what the hell im talking about because I confirmed it in the practice tool myself.

> will just briefly interrupt it for like 0.2 seconds 

You just admitted I was right. There is a delay, and it will be significant.

> [{quoted}](name=XTRMN00B1337,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5EWwZAVd,comment-id=000400000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-26T12:28:08.110+0000)
>
> You just admitted I was right. There is a delay, and it will be significant.

Im arguing against you claiming the toggle is a significant delay that will get you killed. Its not. Its not. Go confirm it for yourself.

It is. I have level 7 and 20k more points than you on Aatrox. I am definitively more qualified than you to talk about wether ~0.5 seconds is life or death. The answer is YES. Kha'zix's Q cd was reduced by 0.5 seconds and it was very significant. It's the same in this case. 0.2 seconds can easily mean one more or less auto attack.

Then make sure you are in the right setting before you die.  .2 seconds can easily mean one more or less auto attack however I don't see why he needs this buff.  He still performs perfectly fine and cases in which this comes up are super rare.  

The enemy killed you once already, I think they deserve an extra .2 seconds.
cause it takes too much concentration to revive that you cant turn your blade sideways {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Because you can't cast abilities while you're dead. That includes when you're in stasis due to revival effects.

Aatrox is getting a big rework, the biggest one apparently in all League of Legends History. They are already working on him so hopefully they will make Aatrox what he is described in his Lore. 

A Powerful Godlike Killing Machine.
